articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: MEASURING PSYCHOLOGY
articles.contents:
Measuring Psychology is a global community and study group of aspiring and current students, professors, and interested people that help each other. We all have an interest in measurement theory for psychology and psychometrics. Through discussions, solidarity, and openness, we are boosting psychological science by improving measurement.


Join our discussion






Reading list
Here you will find papers suggested by our community and you may add a suggestion yourself.








Sign up
If you want to take part in our live sessions, follow this link to fill the interest form.






Community


We are a group of people who are interested in measurement theory and psychometrics for psychology.
We are from all around the world, with different backgrounds (from undergraduate to Ph.D.â€™s; from academia and industry).
This is a safe place to learn, ask questions and teach.
